Articles.Content:
More Easter Eggs Mod

Hello, i have been playing ksp for the past 4 years, and in that time some of the most fun 

i had was finding and hunting all the easter eggs planted with in the game, but after a while

they dried up and no more have been put in the game or found for a while.

This is where i present the More Easter Eggs mod.

I will be using [Kerbal Konstructs](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/105247-0-90-Kerbal-Konstructs-%28v0-70%29-Create-New-Bases-and-Launchsites!?p=1636040#post1636040) to create static objects, easter eggs in the kerbal system. i will be placing them almost anywhere.

Some pictures:

> 
> its not much but its a start.
> 
> ![EJC0Nv2.png](http://i.imgur.com/EJC0Nv2.png)
> 
> 

If you have any questions or suggests then im all ears.

If anyone could provide some cool looking models to use as easter eggs then that would be awsome.![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

Also this will be my first addon/mod thingy be kind ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

As some people take finding Easter eggs to heart may i request that anyone 

talking about the easter eggs or showing pictures of them put them behind a spoiler. Please and Thanks

> 
> All Rights Reserved. (i will get a better licence.)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-12T18:06:10Z" title="08/12/2015 06:06  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 12, 2015</time> by ArcticVoid**

> 
> Monolith around Jool? Pretty please?

like this: 

> ![JZF6J7c.png](http://i.imgur.com/JZF6J7c.png)

>  good look finding that.
Well, there's already the \*REDACTED\* on Vall...
can there be a North korean flag on the Sun, just for laughs?

> 
>  Alien eggs
> 
> Fracture though entire mun (Reference to prophet [Mohamed splitting the mun](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Splitting_of_the_moon) in half as proof of his prophet hood)
> 
> Landed rocket from Jules Verne (first science fiction)
> 
> Crash landed chair with rockets from [Wan Hu](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wan_Hu) on the far side of the mun
> 
> Exploration tank of Tin Tin on the Moon
> 
> Many Crash landed exploration vessels on duna
> 
> Soemaker on a collision course with Jool
> 
> Voyager 1/2 arriving from another solar system with a message of peace
> 
> Faces on Duna,
> 
> Broken Regolith harvester on Mun (Reference the movie Moon)
> 
> 

- - - Updated - - -

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-21T23:57:27Z" title="08/21/2015 11:57  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 21, 2015</time> by FreeThinker**
Do you think you could make a tutorial, I have been wanting to make my own easter eggs.
